description.translate: Take a step into the void. Accept it. Learn It. Make it your own! Now it's yours...

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Confiance céleste\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Faites un pas dans le vide. Acceptez-le. Apprenez-le.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Appropriez-le vous ! Il vous appartient, désormais...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Take a step into the void. Accept it. Learn It.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Make it your own! Now it's yours...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7LUC§a1 §7DAR§c-1\"}"]}}
